data.description_html:
An invisible barrier holds back vermin.
A vermin with Hit Dice of less than one-third your level cannot penetrate the barrier.
A vermin with Hit Dice of one-third your level or more can penetrate the barrier if it succeeds on a Will save.
Even so, crossing the barrier deals the vermin 2d6 points of damage, and pressing against the barrier causes pain, which deters most vermin.
data.name: Repel Vermin
data.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
